sentence.Network_en: These expressions are often used interchangeably, but they do have different meanings.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些表达方式经常相互替代使用，但它们的含义却有所不同。

sentence.Network_en: These two words can be used interchangeably.
The two terms are often used interchangeably.
sentence.Network_cn: 这两个术语常常互换使用.

entry.tran: 可交换的;可互换的;可交替的
entry.def: Things that are interchangeable can be exchanged with each other without it making any difference.

example.ex: His greatest innovation was the use of interchangeable parts...
example.tran: 他最大的革新在于使用了可互换的零件。

example.ex: Every part on the new models is interchangeable with those on the original.
example.tran: 新款上的每一个零部件与原先的都可互换。
